body:
So here in dis fourm topic you post riddles and others try to solve them here are a few

1. In Toronto, Ontario why can't you take a picture of a man with a wooden leg?

2. A tree grows for 10 years and reaches its maximum height  each year it doubles its height. When will it be half its height?

3. If you have 3 apples and take away 2 how many do u have?



Soooo please post ur riddles
body_tagged:

2. A tree grows for 10 years and reaches its maximum height  each year it doubles its height. When will it be half its height?

3. If you have 3 apples and take away 2 how many do u have?



Soooo please post ur riddles
title: Riddels

1. Don't know
2. 10 years
3. 3 apples

replies.body:
1.
There is a couple, the wife shoots her husband, puts him underwater for 5 minutes, thn finally, hangs him. 15 minutes after all this, they both go out and have a romantic dinner, how is this possible? (Hint: Year is 1993)
2.
When can you shoot, and steal, and not get arrested?

I made a post like this on the old forums so some ppl may know mine:
1) The more you take the more you leave behind, what am I?

replies.body:
footsteps

A bus driver was heading toward downtown. He went past a stop sign without stopping, and went through every intersection without stopping, all of that while a cop was watching him. Why didn't he get a ticket?

What is greater than God?;
What is more evil than the devil?;
The poor have it;
The rich don't need it;
And if you eat it, you die.

What is it?
